apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium.

versions.localizedDescription: Spotify Updated to v8.5.60, Spotilife Updated to v1.7

apps.versionDescription: Latest version of spotify that works with Spotilife v1.8 (latest)
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ is essentially the same as normal Spotify. Except it contains an injected tweak that activates premium features, the same features you would have if you purchased Spotify Premium. There is only one exception: No downloads

So what does Spotify++ offer?

• No Ads
• Unlimited skips
• Play any song or album
• Extreme streaming quality enabled
• No forced shuffle
• Import songs from Music App

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.
This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.
This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.
This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

apps.name: SoundCloud++
apps.subtitle: SoundCloud with no Ads and extra features

versions.localizedDescription:
Updated SoundCloud to v6.16.0
Updated DarkCloud to v1.4

apps.versionDescription:
Updated SoundCloud to v6.16.1
DarkCloud at Latest (v1.4)
apps.localizedDescription:
SoundCloud Injected with DarkCloud - A Tweak that disables Ads and enables the developer menu which includes a wide range of adjustmets the user can make to the app

DarkCloud allows users to do the following:

•Block audio and video ads
•Enable developer menu
•Hide Go+ tab

No options to enable. Just install and enjoy.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.
This lets you import and upload your own music to SoundCloud
This lets you use SoundCloud with external accesories.
This gives SoundCloud Access to local audio files.
This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

news.caption: Spotify has been updated to v8.6.42 along with Spotilife, now v1.8. Sadly, Spotify has patched Spotilife on all later versions - so it cannot be updated
news.title: Spotify++ Updated - and last for a while
SoundCloud++ Updated!
news.caption: SoundCloud++ has been updated to the latest version (v6.16.1), DarkCloud remains at the latest version (v1.4)
